questions.question: She ---> He : "I don't like this house"

choices.answer: She told him that she didn't like that house
She told him that she didn't like this house
She told he that she doesn't like that house
She told him that she don't like that house

questions.question: In reported speech, present tense changes to .........

choices.answer: nothing. It stays present tense
past tense
future tense
will

questions.question: Make this sentence a reported speech

choices.answer: John told us that Martin would do all the exams well
John told us that Martin is doing all the exams well
John told us that Martin had done all the exams well
John told us that Martin to do all the exams well

He said that he would have bought a new laptop

choices.answer: where
here
that

questions.question: What is the correct Reported Question?

choices.answer: He wanted to know if did I live in Melbourne.

choices.answer: would
may
could
